unnormalised: ## Tumchea Bhurgeanchea Report Card-achem Mahatva: Eka Paipalache Margadarshan
normalised: ## Tumchea Bhurgeanchea Report Card-ak Somzop: Eka Paichem Margdorxon

unnormalised: Paipal mhunn, ami utsukten report card-anchi vatt polletat, tim amchea bhurgeanchea shikxonnachea proveasanchea snapshots zata. Grades, comments, ani purnn mullyankan somzunn ghevnk, te khuxalkai, chinta, vo punn ghondollachem karan zaunk xakta. Hea blog post-acho hetu shikxonnachea parinnamank ani grading system-ank somzunn gheunk ek vistrut margadarshan divop, khas korun Bharoti sondorbhat.
normalised: Paichem mhunn, ami utsuktaien report card-anchi vatt polletat, jim amchea bhurgeanchea xaikxnik provexacho fotu asta. Grade, tipnneo, ani puro assessment samzop khuxi, chinta, va kadachit ghondollachoi karonn zaunk xakta. Hea blog postacho hetu xaikxnik results ani grading systems somzunk, khas korun Bharoti sondrbhant, ek purai margdorxon divop asa.

unnormalised: Poileach, ami grading systemacher dhyan dium-ia. Bharotantlea zaitea xallamni, CBSE vo ICSE curriculum follow korun, eka ankhi vo akxrik grading system-acho vapor kortat. Ankhi system-ant sadarponnank porcentages astata, je bhaxen 85% ek distinction suchoita. Akxrik grades A+ than E poriant astat, A+ chodd korun 91-100 marks suchoita ani E fail zalole grade suchoita. Tumchea bhurgeache xallein vapor kelole grading scale somzunn ghevnk zaiti gorjechi. Zai zalear xikxokanank vicharcho kiteak mhonn bhienaka. Kaim xalleank attli grading system-ui asta.
normalised: Poileach, grading system-acher lokx dium-ia. Bharatantleo zaiteo xalla, C-B-S-E va I-C-S-E curriculum apnnaun, eka ankddi va akxrik grading system vapurtat. Ankddi systems samannea ritin tokdde vapurtat, toxem assi tokdde ek distinction dakoitat. Akxrik grades A plus-antle E meren astat, A plus chodd korun novod ek-antle xembhor marks dakoitat ani E naapas zalole grade dakoitat. Tumchea bhurgeachea xallen vaprollelea vixex grading scale-ak somzop khup mhotvachem. Zori goroz asli tor xikxokank vichrunk khinchuk naka. Kaim xalleank apleoch bhitruleo grading systems-ui astat.

unnormalised: Final grade-anchea voilean, vixoi-nixtt marks-ancher barik dhyan di. Ganitantle 72 marks punn English-ant 98 marks ekdom suttkechem boll ani dhyan divpachi goroz aslolem xetr suchoita. Fakt ankheanvancher dhyan diunk nhoi; xikxokanche comments samballun vachat. Him comments tumchea bhurgeachea shikxonnachea proveasavixim moladik suchna ditat, bollaikay, kamzorta ani sudharonnek xetram suchoitat. "Problem sums"-acher odik kam korpachi goroz asa mhonn tumi ek comment pollyat zalear, tumi ghara kam korunchea khuxikuch zanno zatat.
normalised: Final grade-achea bhair, vixoi-nirdharit marks-ancher lokx dium. Gonitant sattor ani don punn Inglixint novod ani atth marks ek domixta ani ek lokx diunk zai oso bhag dakoitat. Fokot ankddeancher lokx divunk naka; xikxokacheo tipnneo chodd kallji purvek vachat. He tipnneo tumchea bhurgeachea xikxonn prokriient mhotvachi mahiti ditat, domixta, kamzorta ani sudronn koruncheo zago ujvaddak haddtat. Zori tumi eka tipnneaent “problem sums”acher odik kam koruncheachem asa mhonn ailem zalear, tumkam thauk asa tumchea ghora kitem korunchem.

unnormalised: Class averages tumchea bhurgeachea utkrxxttachea sondorbhak providh koritat. Science-ant class average 60 asa ani tumchea bhurgeank 65 mell'llear, tankam sadaronn poros thorode chodd mell'lleat. Tori punn, class average 80 asa zalear, 65 marks odik dhyan divn korpachi goroz suchoita. Kaim xalla percentile ranks ui providh koritat, tumchea bhurgean kitlench vidharthiancheporos chodd marks mell'lleat suchoita. 80-achem percentile rank mhunnttlear tumchea bhurgeank apnna bhurgeanchea vargak 80% poros chodd marks mell'lleat.
normalised: Class averages tumchea bhurgeachea provexak ek sndrbh ditat. Zori Viganeancho class average satt ani tumchea bhurgean satt ani panch ghetle tor, tankam samanneapexa odik provex asa. Punn zori class average assi asa tor, satt ani panch provex zaito diuncheak goroz asa dakoita. Kaim xalla percentile ranks-ui ditat, tim kitlim bhurgim tumchea bhurgean odik provex kelam tem dakoitat. Assi percentile rank mhonnje tumchea bhurgean tankanchea classmate-anchea assipexa odik score ghetla.

unnormalised: Vegvegllea grading metrics-ank somzunn gheunk zaiti gorjechi. Continuous Comprehensive Evaluation (CCE), chodd korun zaitea Bharoti xallamni follow kortat, formative assessments (FA1, FA2, itia.) vorsobhor asta, purnn grade-ak summative assessments (SA1, SA2 - sadaronnponnan moddi-term ani final exams) soddun. Hem assessments-ak dilelem weightage bodolta, punn sadaronnponnan, 40% weightage Formative Assessments-ak dil'lem asta. Ek final score oxi dista: FA1 (10/10) + FA2 (9/10) + SA1 (75/80) + FA3 (8/10) + FA4 (9/10) + SA2 (70/80) = Overall Grade.
normalised: Vegvegllea grading metrics-ank somzopui mhotvachem asa. Continuous Comprehensive Evaluation (C-C-E), zaito Bharoti xalleanim apnnaun, year-bhar formative assessments (F-A ek, F-A don, iteadi) vapurta, je summative assessments (S-A ek, S-A don – samannea ritin modhi-term ani final exams)-achea vangdda final grade-ak yogdan ditat. Hea assessments-ak dilelem weightage bodlot, punn samannea ritin, challis tokdde Formative Assessments-ank detat. Ek final score koxe dista: F-A ek (daha-nk daha divun) plus F-A don (novea-nk daha divun) plus S-A ek (pontterichea-nk assiek divun) plus F-A tin (attha-nk daha divun) plus F-A char (novea-nk daha divun) plus S-A don (sattor-nk assiek divun) mhonnje Overall Grade.

unnormalised: Regular attendance ani participation shikxonnachea utkrxxttachea khatir zaitich gorjechi. Ek nirantar attendance record (ex, vorsobhor 95% attendance) bhurgeank concept-ank borench samballunk ani varga discussion-ant utsavponnan vantto gheunk providh korta. Participation marks chodd korun purnn grade-ak vantto ditat ani vixeavixim bhurgeachea nivedank dista.
normalised: Nhemean yetolem ani bhag ghetele khup xaikxnik provexak mhotvachem. Ek ek sarki attendance record (zoxem, year-bhar novod ani panch tokdde attendance) bhurgeank tatvik vichar samzunk ani class discussions-ant bhag gheunk ditat. Bhag ghevop marks zaito overall grade-ak yogdan ditat ani vixoiek tumchea bhurgeanchem askt dakoitat.

unnormalised: Report cards kedna kedna sports, music, vo art bhaxen co-curricular activities khatir grades vo scores ditat. Hem assessments samballtalea lokanche utkrxxttachea vikasak manyata dita ani uttejit karta. He scores dismiss korunk naka; te molachim skills ani talents distat tumchea bhurgeachea purnn utkrxxttak vantto ditat.
normalised: Report cards kadanch co-curricular activities-ank marks ditat, zoxem sport, music, va art. He assessments mandun gheta ani bhurgeanche purai provexak udrek ditat. He marks uddoitat naka; te mhotvacheo kuxolta ani buddhi dakoitat je tumchea bhurgeanche purai provexak yogdan ditat.

unnormalised: Nimanneak, ek report card ekuch puzzle-acho tukddo. Tem tempa sarke disnnem, tumchea bhurgeachea xakticho nirnnoy nhoi. Grading system-achim barikayi somzunn ghevncher, xikxokanche comments interpret korpacher ani tumchea bhurgeachea shikxonnachea vaddik ek adar divpi vatavorn providh korpacher dhyan di. Success-ank man divncher, vighnam nirman korpi torin soddun, ani shikopacho mog vaddovncher vargam voilean cholta. Tumchea bhurgeank apnnakuch khas xetramni adar divn apnnakuch punnyay mellovnchea khatir uttejit kor.
normalised: Nantor, ek report card fokot ek tukddo asa. Tem eka vellacho fotu asa, tumchea bhurgeachem provex dakoita mhunn nemnuk nhoi. Grading system-acheo kholayo somzunk, xikxokacheo tipnneo samzunk, ani tumchea bhurgeak xaikxnik provexak ek adhar divpi vatavronn divpak lokx diiat. Yoxachea utsov koruncheak yaad dovrat, dukhi prashnachem uttor dilam mhunn sangacheak ani xikxonnacho mog vaddoicheak je class-achea bhair zaunk zata. Tumchea bhurgeak pottem divchem ki atlean atlean assi tokdde tankanchea fuddleachea exams-ant gheunk tankam adhar diun.
